author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...KIKO STRENGTHENS AS A CATEGORY FOUR HURRICANE AS IT APPROACHES THE CENTRAL PACIFIC BASIN...
summary: ...KIKO STRENGTHENS AS A CATEGORY FOUR HURRICANE AS IT APPROACHES THE CENTRAL PACIFIC BASIN... As of 5:00 PM HST Fri Sep 05 the center of Kiko was located near 14.9, -138.7 with movement WNW at 12 mph. The minimum central pressure was 946 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 140 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...KIKO STRENGTHENS AS A CATEGORY FOUR HURRICANE AS IT APPROACHES THE CENTRAL PACIFIC BASIN... As of 5:00 PM HST Fri Sep 05 the center of Kiko was located near 14.9, -138.7 with movement WNW at 12 mph. The minimum central pressure was 946 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 140 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Kiko (EP1/EP112025)
